actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to expedite the domestic production of steel roof bolts and steel roof bolt plates used in coal mining operations.

summary.text: Directs and authorizes the President to expedite the domestic production of steel roof bolts and steel roof bolt plates used in underground coal mining operations.

titles.title: A bill to expedite the domestic production of steel roof bolts and steel roof bolt plates used in coal mining operations.
